collection.legend: Were you due to collect your document from the Post Office?

tracking-number-radio.legend: Do you have a tracking number?

tracking-number.label: What is your tracking number?
tracking-number.hint: If applicable, the consignment number may also be added here

received.legend: Have you received your decision by letter or email?

delivery-date.legend: What is the date on the letter?(optional)

case-id-number.label: Case ID Number
case-id-number.hint: Enter the case ID found on your visa decision letter.

no-letter.label: I don't have the letter anymore

delivery-details.label: If the courier could have problems delivering to this address, for example there's no door number, then let us know and we'll contact them. (optional)

address-match.legend: Would you like your BRP sent to the address that is on the letter from the Home Office?

nationality.label: Country of nationality.
nationality.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

use-address.label: I want to be contacted by post

org-help.legend: Are you completing this form on behalf of the BRP holder?
org-help.hint: Friends, relatives, employers, charity workers and lawyers, for example, can complete this form on behalf of the BRP holder.
